attributes.action: Be Sacked Over The State Of the Country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that Gordon brown and his party have put this country into so much debt that we will be paying it for the rest of our lives. The 2.5% vat cut is pointless this will just be added onto further taxes in the future, beer, cigarettes, car tax etc. People won’t even notice the difference on the vat cut. 
He is making the people who work hard to earn there cash suffer in more misery. 
The company’s who have not fallen suit in the bank of England cut is a disgrace and the government should be forcing the issue onto these companies. 
The endless funds that are used to back the war in Iraq should be put back into our country instead of worrying about a country that has got nothing to do with us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
